mailNew_mailintro.en: Hi thanks for using the %SNAME% service. This e-mail is sent so that you can verify your e-mail address:

mailNew_urlintro.en: In order to continue registration of a new user on %SNAME%, visit the following URL:

mailLost_urlintro.en: To reset your password at %SNAME%, use the following URL:

mail_tokeninfo.en: This URL contains a secret token that validates your e-mail address. This token is valid for only 5 days. If this token expire, you have to request a new token by starting the registration over again.

s1_para1.en: The first step is to register and verify your e-mail address. Make sure that you fill in an e-mail address where you can receive e-mail.

s1_para2.en: You will receive a e-mail including a url you have to follow to continue the registration.

s2_para1.en: An e-mail is sent to you with a link that you need to follow in order to continue the registration proccess.

s3_intro.en: Type in your user account information.

review_intro.en: Your user id is %UID%. On this page can you alter some of the registered user information.

lpw_para1.en: Type the e-mail address you used when you registered your account to reset your password.

lpw_para2.en: You will receive a e-mail including a url you can access to reset the lost password.

lpw_reg_para1.en: Your user id is %UID%. Type you new password twice.

lpw_success_para1.en: An e-mail is sent to you with a link that you need to follow in order to reset your password.

new_complete_para1.en: You are now successfully registered at %SNAME%.

new_mailUsed_para1.en: A user is already registrated in %SNAME% with this e-mail address. This system allows only one user registration for each e-mail address.

email_not_found.en: This e-mail address is not registered in this system.

illegal_email.en: This (%VAR1%) does not look like ann valid e-mail address.

invalid_token.en: Invalid token provided. The most common reason why a token becomes invalid is that the token you received has timed out. A token is only valid in a limited time period. Regsiter again to receive a new fresh token.

err_retype_pw.en: The two typed password did not match.

void_value.en: Empty value is not allowed for %VAR1%.

uid_taken.en: Username taken. You have to select a different username.

uid_not_found.en: User id: %VAR1% is not found in the catalog.

cpw_para1.en: Your user id is %UID%. Type the new password twice to and Submit set new password.

uid_desc.en: Allowed chars for the User id is a-z, - and 0-9. It must start with a letter. The length of the User id is between 3 and 16 chars.
